ReferenceDocuments.name: If the donor died as a result
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the donor died as a result of the collection, specify the cause of death:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2729065
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedMedicalCondition.value(ANY=>CD).originalText (complication) WHERE PerformedMedicalCondition.value(ANY=>CD).nullFlavor = "OTH" (complication) AND PerformedSubstanceExtraction > DefinedProcedure (extraction surgery) > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure (overall extraction process) > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedObservation (extraction monitoring) > PerformedObservation (monitoring) > PerformedMedicalCondition (complication) > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation (AE assessment) > AdverseEvent (complication AE) AND PerformedObservation (monitoring) > PerformedMedicalCondition (death) > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation (AE assessment) > AdverseEvent (death AE) > CausalAssessment > EvaluatedResultRelationship > PerformedMedicalCondition (complication)  AND EvalutedResultRelationship.probabilityCode = "definite"
